page.title: 09RELIGION IN RATHFRILAND
page.content: THE ELIM CHURCH WAS ERECTED IN 1940.HOWEVER,THEY BEGAN THEIR MEETINGS IN A HALL IN THE SQUARE IN THE EARLY 1930'S. RECENTLY THEY HAVE BUILT A NEW EXTENSION FOR THEIR SUNDAY SCHOOL. THE BAPTIST CHURCH BEGAN IN A SMALL WOODEN HALL IN THE 1960'S. A NEW CHURCH HAS BEEN BUILT ON THE SAME SITE. THIS OCCURRED IN EARLY 1984. THE REASON FOR THIS WAS BECAUSE OF THEIR GROWING MEMBERSHIP. THE BRETHREN CHURCH HAS A HALL IN SCHOOL ROAD WHICH IS USED FOR CHILDRENS' MEETINGS. THE DRUMLOUGH GOSPEL HALL IS USED FOR THEIR SENIOR MEETINGS. THE REFORMED PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH IS SITUATED CLOSE TO THE FIRE STATION. IT IS OFTEN GIVEN THE NAME "THE ROCK". THIS CHURCH HAS ONLY A SMALL MEMBERSHIP NOW.
